benchmark_details.name: Omnibus Dataset for Multimodal News Deception (OmniFake)
benchmark_details.overview: The Omnibus Dataset for Multimodal News Deception (OmniFake) is a comprehensive benchmark of 127K samples that integrates human-curated misinformation from existing resources with newly synthesized AI-generated examples. It supports the unified detection of both human-written and AI-generated fake content.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To detect both human-crafted and AI-generated multimodal misinformation on social media.

data.source: Fakeddit dataset and newly synthesized AI-generated content.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on classification results from the detection framework.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance in identifying misinformation.
methodology.validation: Dataset split into training, validation, and testing.
